alert.note: Alert for Hernando; Pasco (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 26 at 4:42PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of west central Florida, including the following counties, Hernando and Pasco. * WHEN...Until 645 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. Overflowing poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 442 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is already occurring in the advisory area. Between 2 and 4 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Spring Hill, New Port Richey, Brooksville, Hudson, Weeki Wachee, Timber Pines, Hernando County Airport, North Weeki Wachee, Weeki Wachee Gardens, Pine Island, South Brooksville, North Brooksville, Jasmine Estates, New Port Richey East, Land O Lakes, Beacon Square, Shady Hills, Weeki Wachee Acres, Masaryktown and High Point. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
